text: @realDonaldTrump USA NEEDS TO FIX OUR SUPPLY CHAIN; CORONAVIRUS SPREAD BECAUSE USA HAD TO DEPEND ON OTHER COUNTRIES FOR ESSENTIAL SUPPLIES. THIS DEPENDENCY BROUGHT USA TO OUR KNEES. FEDERAL LAW SHOULD MAKE IT ILLEGAL FOR USA TO MAKE ESSENTIAL, MEDICAL SUPPLIES OVERSEAS.
